section.title: Notes
section.para: The script rtf2xml converts Microsoft's proprietary rich text format (RTF) format to XML. It preserves as much information the RTF files as possible, giving an XML author the choice of what elements to use for further transformations.
After you transform the RTF file to XML, you can further transform the resulting file to simplified docbook with the xsl stylesheet I have provided. There is also a script
Please see the documentation for the full details.

The raw XML file that results from an rtf2xml transformation seeks to be identical to the original file--with the exception that the transformation is structured XML. Ideally, only one could use rtf2xml and XSLT to change a file to and from RTF with not data loss.
